item.title: Houdini HDAs
item.description: Houdini HDAs, also known as digital assets are used to package up nodes for reuse in convenient ways. [!NOTE] You can think of houdini as development enviornment for CG

item.title: Houdini Hub
item.description: Houdini is a procedural 3D Development Enviornment. item.title: Houdini Procedural Modeling Fundimentals
item.description: Because houdinis underlying architecture is procedural and node-based, creating systems for anything that follow that model is fairly straightforward as long as you understand how things work.
